OOC: Three gestalts so far.  Well, I'm not sure, is Abominus ready yet?
::C=
omposer/Surgital/Cutthroat::

    The net on Composer deteriorates, and the=
n Composer jumps onto his feet.

    "Thanks, Wheeljack.  Let's get those l=
ittle Decepticreeps!" Composer said, then flew up into the air, and fired 4=
 shots from his plasma rifle at Autofire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~
     Surgital stomped the ground in anger when his saw blade mis=
sed the Galactor jets.  And then, Surgital saw a bot he wanted to challenge=
.  Surgital wanted a gestalt to gestalt.

     "Me and you punk!" Surgital =
yelled at a gestalt missing a left arm.

     Surgital's left hand converte=
d into a laser.  He shot it down at the runt that was Tantrum to get out of=
 the fight he was hoping to start with the lightning using gestalt.  Then, =
after firing the laser, Surgital shot another laser at Lavatron's side.

  =
